name: LondonTrainTimes
0:
”Alexa, ask train times for the next train”
”Alexa, ask train times next train from Kensal Green”
”Alexa, ask train times next train from Paddington”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: train times
des:
Ask this skill for the next train from a London Overground or Elizabeth line station, and we'll give you the next two trains for each destination. Your station is saved, after that just ask for 'next train'. The skill uses the live arrivals feed from TfL and will read them out the times.

For example, you can ask for "next train from Hampstead Heath". After that, just ask for the "next train" to get the Hampstead Heath arrivals again.

The coverage is for train services operated by TfL, which are London Overground or Elizabeth line trains. Trains from other operators in London aren't covered. The departure times are local to London.

More info about saved results:
• The station you last asked for is saved
• Ask for 'next train' and the saved information from the previous query is used
• Ask to forget the station and the stored station will be cleared. Subsequent enquiries will then also ask for the station without saving it
• Ask to reset the settings, and the original behaviour is restored

FAQ
Q. What stations are supported?
A. Stations with London Overground or Elizabeth line services, in the UK.

Q. Does this skill support national rail services?
A. No, you will need to use another skill for those

Q. Why isn't the station I'm asking for getting an answer?
A. It probably doesn't have London Overground or Elizabeth line services. Alternatively, you might have another skill enabled which uses the same invocation of 'ask train times', and Alexa is sending your request to the wrong skill. You will need to check which skills you've enabled in the Alexa app.

If you're having difficulty using the skill, you can email me at techandsoftwareltd@outlook.com

Notes about the data used: The arrivals data is supplied by TfL Open Data: "Contains OS data © Crown copyright and database rights 2016 and Geomni UK Map data © and database rights 2019."
